environment.content:
Hi, do you want to see the AI in action?
Yes, let me see it!
No, take me back

connections.data: All in just a few seconds. Imagine all the possibilities!
Great, I just need to use your camera. Can you click on the "Allow" message, please?
Now, just click to take a photo.
Do you want to see how it's made?
Designing for display on your website...
Yes! Show me the source graph
